metadata.title: CVE-2021-35306 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through v1.6.0-636. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function AP4_StszAtom::WriteFields located inAp4StszAtom.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (DOS).

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
